entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
